45minutes
4servings

Recipe ingredients

  • 1tbsp. canola or olive oil

  • 3cups diced fresh red yellow and green bell peppers

  • 1/2cup chopped sweet onion

  • 1tube refrigerated pizza dough

  • 1/2cup salsa

  • 2cups sargento chefstyle shredded pepper jack cheese

  • Chopped cilantro or dried oregano

How to Cook it

This recipe was carefully designed and tested by My Baking Addiction. Please check out directions at their website.
